document_data.name: The Pilgrim's Rest
document_data.mainbody: The '''Pilgrim's Rest''', which was also seen as the '''Pilgrims' Rest''', was an [[inn]] that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]].
document_data.Location: The inn was located in the western section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Sea Ward|Sea Ward]] on the west side of [[Satchel Alley]] where it met [[Diamond Street]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Description: The Pilgrim's Rest was a three-story building.
document_data.Activities: This comfortable inn was moderately priced, at least by Waterdeep standards. Many of the patrons stayed here while visiting Waterdeep's temples. A private room could be had for 9 [[gp]] per night and included stabling and a meal. 'Two-share' rooms with a pair of double beds ran 6 gp per night, and a communal room with eight or more beds was 4 gp per night.
document_data.Inhabitants: The inn was owned by [[Balaghast Brightlingar]].
